annotations.description: Another succinct Sasha Petraske creation, this is his sly retort to the popularity of the Cosmopolitan, as the name coyly indicates. Indeed, the drink, piq
annotations.title: PUNCH | Cosmonaut Cocktail Recipe

textContent:
2 ounces gin
3/4 ounce lemon juice
1 barspoon raspberry preserves

Shake and strain.
